name: Narqubis Match 3
shortDescription: A real-time PvP Match-3 game. Battle opponents live with colorful gem matches and boosters.
fullDescription:
Narqubis Match 3 is a fast-paced, competitive Match-3 game that pits you against live opponents in turn-based matches. Match gems strategically, trigger combos, and use power-ups to outplay your rival.

Key Features:

  • PvP Match-3 Battles: Compete head-to-head with another player on the same board, taking turns to make the best moves.
  • Boosters & Power-Ups: Unlock and use special abilities to gain advantage in close matches.
  • Tournaments & Events: Participate in events that challenge your skill and ranking.
  • Progression & Avatars: Customize your profile, earn rewards, and climb the leaderboards as you win.

Find intense, fun match-3 PvP action in Narqubis Match 3 â€” challenge other players live and prove your skill!
